    public class Luigi
extends Character
    Class: COP 3330 OBJECT ORIENTED PROGRAMMING (Java) 12:30PM - 1:20PM Homework FOUR-E : AdventureGame Extra credit Luigi Class: Mario, Luigi, and Toad all have similar code Except for the result of what happens when they move into "said" space. Luigi can defuse a bomb omb.

    Justin Holzman
